Name: Single Revival Agent
AttributesDescription: Instantly revives a selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
Single Revival Potion
[Effect] Stabilizes the Resonator's condition to a certain extent and aids in their recovery.
[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.
[Warning] Prohibited to use in combination with the same type of potion or any frequency stabilizing potions.
ObtainedShowDescription: Instantly revives a selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
